definition: bar buoy/buoy marking shallows or sandbar
pinyin: qian3 tan1 zhi3 shi4 fu2 biao1

sentences.chinese: 免費淺灘嬰兒阿富汗模式。

sentences.english: He led the team to avoid dangerous shallows.
sentences.chinese: 他帶領隊伍避開危險的淺灘。

sentences.english: Fast moving water with riffles and small waves.
sentences.chinese: 有淺灘和小浪的快速流動的水。

sentences.english: There are dangerous rocks and shallows near the island.
sentences.chinese: 在那個小島附近有危險的岩石和淺灘。

sentences.english: The area called the grand banks was the most abundant fishing ground in the world.
sentences.chinese: 號稱大淺灘的海域是當時世界上產魚最多的漁場。

sentences.english: As I arrived at the ford in the river, I pulled up my pant legs and prepared to cross.
sentences.chinese: 我來到河的淺灘處，挽起褲腿，預備趟過去。

sentences.english: As I walked along the river towards the ford, I thought about my forefathers.
sentences.chinese: 我一邊沿着河邊朝淺灘走去，一邊想我的祖先們。

sentences.english: The soldier rode out of the ford with the scouts in advance.
sentences.chinese: 偵察兵先涉過淺灘，戰士們跟着安然渡過。

sentences.english: Most current marine fish farms are in shallow, near-shore waters.
sentences.chinese: 目前，大多數海洋魚類養殖場都位於近海淺灘。

sentences.english: In this paper the mechanism of shoal formation in the Changjiang River in natural state is investigated at first.
sentences.chinese: 論文首先考察了自然情況下川江淺灘的形成機理。

sentences.english: There at the fording in the little boat the unknown man plays upon his lute.
sentences.chinese: 淺灘的小舟上有個不相識的人正彈著琵琶。

sentences.english: Cape becomes bar, and plain shoal, and valley and gorge deep water and channel.
sentences.chinese: 岬角成了沙洲和淺灘，溪谷和山峽成了深水與湖峽。

sentences.english: A deep-draft vessel shall pay particular attention to the latest depth over the shoal in the channel.
sentences.chinese: 深喫水船舶應特別注意位於航道中淺灘上的最新深度。

sentences.english: The Battle of the Trident was fought at what would come to be called the ruby ford.
sentences.chinese: 三叉戟之戰發生於一個後來被稱爲紅寶石淺灘的地方。

sentences.english: The ship was assigned to beacon the shoals.
sentences.chinese: 這船被指定用來標誌淺灘。

sentences.english: Steady sunward, though the weather hide the wide and treacherous shoal.
sentences.chinese: 堅定不移向着太陽，度過淺灘暗礁。

definition: Wusu city in Tacheng prefecture 塔城地區|塔城地区[Ta3 cheng2 di4 qu1], Xinjiang
to move about/to go from place to place/roving/mobile
Beiguan district of Anyang city 安陽市|安阳市[An1 yang2 shi4], Henan
no sign of human habitation (idiom); desolate
(bird species of China) grey heron (Ardea cinerea)
water so clear you can see the bottom
